name: NAUGHTY BOYS' X-MAS
description:
Little Willy is a naughty boy who never gets any presents for Christmas.  The only way to get  presents is to steal them from Santa Claus. Will he be able to break through Santa's defence?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO INSTALL

-Unarchive the ZIP file

-Open NaughtyBoysChristmas.exe file

-Enjoy!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project uses a free version of A* pathfinding from https://arongranberg.com/astar/
